original_title: 「シャワーだけ貸してあげるよ」終電なくなり同僚女子社員の部屋に… 無防備すぎるおっぱいと生脚に興奮した僕はチラつく妻の存在が吹き飛ぶほど一晩中モウレツにハメ狂った…
overview: Maiyuki, who joined the company at the same time as me, was on the fast track to success... I'm desperately clinging to my marriage, and the gap has widened. She started supporting Maiyuki, but she couldn't catch up and stayed overtime every day. "Aren't you taking a bath? Damn! It's close to my room... I'll lend you a shower." Striking a natural face without make-up! I just want to fuck and can't stand it...
title: “You Can Just Use The Shower” At My Female Co-worker’s Place After Missing The Last Train… Her Tits Have Me Horny, I Completely Forget About My Wife and Fuck Like Crazy The Entire Night… Mayuki Ito
